entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 9. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
